title: STOP Buying FREE RANGE CHICKEN Until You Watch This

tasks.task: Raising free-range chickens in mountainous regions.
subtasks: Incubating eggs at an optimal temperature and humidity.
Transferring hatched chicks to well-ventilated coops.
Providing chicks with a clean, warm environment and nutritious food.
Introducing organic food sources as chicks grow.
Allowing chickens to roam unsupervised in natural environments.
Ensuring chickens have space and protection from predators in indoor conditions.
Harvesting chickens at the appropriate weight for meat or egg production.
